notes: shadcn uses Tailwind CSS classes on raw HTML elements; vlting provides pre-styled components.
All vlting Typography components use styledHtml() which renders actual semantic HTML elements.
Heading weight alternation pattern: h1(heavy/$6) -> h2(light/$5) -> h3(heavy/$4) -> h4(light/$3) -> h5(heavy/$2) -> h6(light/$1).
All components accept standard HTML element props and Tamagui style props.
Components are individually exported (not a compound component).
Uses Tamagui font tokens ($heading, $body, $mono, $quote) for consistent typography across brands.
